description: '''Cults''' is an American [[indie pop]] band formed in New York City in 2010. The band first rose to prominence after the release of their debut extended play, ''Cults 7â€³'' (2010), which was released on their [[Bandcamp]] page. They signed with English singer [[Lily Allen]]'s record label [[In the Name Of (record label)|In the Name Of]], an imprint of [[Sony Music]] to release their [[Cults (album)|eponymous debut studio album]] (2011). A song from the album, "Bad Things" was sampled by American rapper [[J. Cole]] for his 2013 single, "[[She Knows (J. Cole song)|She Knows]]", on which they were credited as featured artists.
